# PED::SET_PED_LOD_MULTIPLIER

## Summary
Sets a lod multiplier for the given ped. Start by using low values (1.1, 1.5, etc) until the wanted result is achieved. Large values are not appropriate and will be expensive!

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** multiplier
